footer.text: Character Guide • Build: Noelle | Update Date: 10/06/2022 | Editor: Sew#2409

fields.name: Best Weapon(s):
fields.value: __Redhorn Stonethresher__ Redhorn as a weapon is tailor made for Noelle's kit. High Crit mainstat, additional DEF and DEF to Normal and Charged ATK DMG bonus make it Noelle's best weapon.

fields.name: Main Stats Priority
fields.value: <sands> DEF% or ATK% |<goblet>  Geo DMG Bonus |<circlet> CRIT Rate or CRIT DMG

fields.name: Substats Priority
fields.value: Energy Recharge|Crit Rate or Crit DMG|DEF%|ATK%

fields.name: Talent Priority
fields.value:
**1)** Normal Attack: Favonious Bladework- Maid
**2)** Elemental Burst: Sweeping Time
**3)** Elemental Skill: Breastplate

fields.name: Notes:
fields.value: Pre C6 ATK% sands may be better than DEF%.
